item.title: Drain has been blocked inside, 15th February
item.description:
Hello I was alredy reporting this issue last year and has een told what regular maitenance will be taken, seems its wasnt, as you may see - water is clear on top and nothing ubstruging from the road level, blockage inside, could you please urgently ask to fix this issue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravensbourne Avenue, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large branches falling into garden with children, 15th February
item.description:
A tree from the local park has massively overgrown and now reaches significantly into the boundary of our garden. Large branches constantly fall from the tree and if they were to hit our children it would cause great harm. We have reported this over 6 months ago and was told someone would investigate but nothing has been done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 185, Ramillies Road, Blackfen, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole within the speed bump, 15th February
item.description:
Pothole is difficult to see and avoid given width of road. As it’s within the speed bump potential to cause damage to car as it goes into the pothole and then has to go over the remainder of the speed bump.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanhope Grove, Upper Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clovelly Road, West Heath, Greater London

item.title: Multiple Potholes – Stevens Close, 15th February
item.description:
The potholes are located along stevens close and are becoming a safety concern for motorists, cyclists, and pedestrians. Some of the potholes appear to be deep, muddy and are worsening due to weather conditions. Potholes has been here for more than 2 months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Lane, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very large pothole, 15th February
item.description:
A second very large pothole open from a poorly filled old repair. Made worse by rain and car traffic. On the ramp of a speed hump meaning unavoidable and continued damage. Please do a proper repair this time, looks like 3rd time lucky?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Champion Hill, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotating cone on the crossing not working, 15th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Morning Lane, Hackney, Greater London
